name: Aida
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Adjacent characters gain +2 Skill.
While one or more Aidas are in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms gain +3 Skill.
"My powers are waning, Niobe! It's as if the gods themselves were growing more distant..."

name: Alfred
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Perform a number of +1 ranged strikes equal to the number of characters adjacent to Alfred.
"I may not be able to run with you lot, but there is still some power in these old bones!"

name: Amon-Ka
effect:
Elf • The Chosen • Necromancer • Undead • Unique
Amon-Ka is a cleric and a wizard and enters play as if he were Level 5.
Order: Once per turn, kill an Undead or a Thrall: Remove one wound from Amon-Ka.
React: Before target character kills Amon-Ka with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or suffer 2 wounds.
"Living or dead, slaves are all the same."

name: Amr Qadir
effect:
Mercenary • Ranger • Unique • Djinn
May equip two Weapons.
May perform Level 1 (Level 3 or lower, if your Warlord is a Mercenary) action cards, regardless of class restrictions.

name: Ancestral Wraiths
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Planar
Spend Order: Move forward two ranks.
React: Once per turn, after Ancestral Wraiths moves into your front rank, target an opposing ready character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 18) or become spent.

name: Austerion
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
Austerion's ranged strikes gain a bonus equal to the number of Elves in your dscard pile.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"Follow behind the forests. Your task shall merely be to ensure the death of any Thessyrian that escapes their branches." - Khilkhameth

name: Back into the Fray
effect:
This card is also a Level 1 cleric spell.
React: After target character within 1 rank readies during the Decree phase: The target performs a melee strike.
Order: Target character gains RIPOSTE +10 until end of turn.
"I'm not dead yet." - Darian Windson

name: Backstab
effect: React: Before this rogue makes a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike is spent, this rogue gets +5 ATK for this strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Betrayal is one of the constant risks of the life, so why should I be above using a little pre-emptive punishment myself?" - Mad Mel

name: Banish the Wound
effect:
Water
Spend Order: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one.
"The Winterhold dwarves clearly have their own priests, yet they seem glad for us to perform minor miracles. Does that not strike you as odd?" - Thekk

name: Baracuuda
effect:
Elf • Aquatic / Vaneris
While in your discard pile, this card is also a Level 1 wizard spell.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds and may target within 1 rank. If the strike hits, spend the target.

name: Baraxton Courage
effect: Order: Destroy Baraxton Courage: Until end of turn, this fighter and any adjacent characters gain +3 ATK, -3 Skill, and POWERATTACK +4.
"It's a good vintage, and better than any drool the Thessyrians can offer. We're not getting more any time soon, so a single barrel's worth fighting for." - Darian Windson

name: Battle Tunes
effect:
Earth
Order: Until end of turn, this rogue gains +3 ATK and, if he is a Bard, your other characters gain +3 ATK while within 1 rank.
"The tunes start out slow, but when they reach their crescendo, your warrior's blood will boil, trust me." - Keziah

name: Bixvrexe
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon / Bound
Spend Order: Move forward one rank. If Bixvrexe is not stunned, perform an attack without spending.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Until end of turn, Bixvrexe gains +5 ATK or an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) when she attacks.

name: Blessed Vestments
effect:
+1 HP
Armor

"We have nothing in our country that could compare to this ironcloth material your priests wear. I would ask for but the smallest scrap as a token of trust and fealty, Alaric. Do this and I will present you to our king." - Brom Frostbeard

name: Blessing of Swiftness
effect:
Air
Order: Target character has an additional melee strike (base = target's primary ATK) when he attacks, until end of turn.
"Ah, the feeling when you tear through flesh and bone of your enemies. And again. And again!" - Naram-Sin

name: Blink
effect: React: After this wizard is targeted with a strike or action by an opposing character: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 14) to move to a different rank and cancel the strike or action.
"The messenger got away. I fear the humans may now know of our plans." - Shadith Glyn

name: Blood for Blood
effect:
This card is also a Level 1 cleric spell.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that was a Critical Success or hit by 5 or more: Remove a wound from this character. If this character is a cleric or a Paladin, you may remove a wound from a character in this rank instead.

name: Bloodthirsty
effect: React: After this character performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character: This fighter performs a melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.
"One can be battle-crazed and still retain his senses, with the correct training. This is what separates us from barbarians." - Dar'rak

name: Blowgun
effect:
Bow
Order: Spend Blowgun: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this rogue's Skill that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 7 + this rogue's Skill) or suffer a wound and permanently gain the Poison trait.

name: Bludgeon
effect:
Nothrog • Dwarf • Barbarian • POWERATTACK +10
Bludgeon gains +4 AC and Skill while targeted with an Earth or Fire action.
Order: Stun BludgeonL Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away.
"Strength breeds true."

name: Bracers of Deflection
effect:
Shield • MAGIC RESISTANCE +0
React: Once per turn, after this wizard is targeted with a strike: This wizard gains +2 AC until end of turn.
"There is a price for my aid, but you will give it willingly. You know that I would not make outrageous demands, do you not?" - Dhamir il Maliq

name: Brom Frostbeard
effect:
Dwarf Warlord
While you control a Dragon, Brom's actions gain +3 to DC saves.
React: Once per turn, after Brom casts a Water spell: Ready target lower Level non-stunned Dwarf.
React: Once per turn, after Brom casts an Earth spell: Until end of turn, target Dwarf gains +3 ATK and AC.
"The first to have regained priestly powers. For this we revere him." - Sigurdur

name: Bruntor's Helm
effect:
+1 HP
Helm

"Denska may be a distant memory now, but the suffering of its people under the yoke of the Deverenian Empire is a tale that is still relevant. That Lord Halbrook and Albrecht both should rally to them an army capable of liberating the country from even the Eternal Emperor should be inspiration enough. We can do the same here..." - Keziah

name: Burning Basilisk
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
May perform Fire actions regardless of class restrictions and gains +1 Level for performing them.
React: After the initiative phase, target a character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 13) or suffer a wound.

name: Carmag Hammerfall
effect:
Dwarf • Free Kingdoms • Scout
Carmag gains +1 Level for equipping Traps.
React: Once per turn, after target character targets Carmag with a strike: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 14) or suffer a wound. This is a Trap.
"What might remains to us should avail to all who would defy the outsiders."

name: Choke Hold
effect: React: After target character performs a melee strike that missed this rogue: Melee strikes against the target gain +3 ATK until end of turn.
"If you're going to try to kill me, the least you could do is make the fight challenging." - Mad Mel

name: Coordinated Assault
effect:
Tactics
Spend Order: Target up to two non-opposing characters: Each target performs an attack, spending as normal. If this fighter is a Ranger, he may move forward or backward one rank.
React: After you win initiative: Perform an attack, spending as normal.
"Your garrisons were unprepared." - Galam-Reth

name: Counterspell
effect:
Bards may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
React: After target opposing character pays the costs for an action card that is a spell: Succeed with a magic check (DC 3 + the target's Skill) to cancel the action.
"Didn't your mom tell you not to do such a thing?" - Keziah Firehair

name: Cowl of Knowledge
effect:
Armor • SCRIBE +4
This cleric gains +1 AC for each spell currently scribed (up to +5).
"It knows all the terrible histories of Thessyria, but always hungers for more. Whisper secrets to it, and it will repay the kindness." - Nin-Gula

name: D'nath
effect:
Elf • Nothrog • STEALTH +6
While in an opposing formation, D'nath gains +3 ATK.
Spend React: After D'nath enters play: Move him to the front rank of an opposing formation.
"The Deverenians continue to harry us. Delay them." - Set'rokh

name: Dala
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
Your The Chosen Warlord and Daemons you control have the ability, "Order: Kill Dala: Move forward one rank."
"The invaders are a sign of the gods' displeasure. If I must die to appease them, so be it."

name: Dancing Scimitar
effect:
Weapon
This card is also a Level 5 rogue item.
This character's melee strikes may not be canceled.
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike roll against this character: Gain +3 AC for the duration of the strike.
"I swear sometimes it moves on its own regard." - Talin Tzin

name: Dar'rak
effect:
Nothrog • Hero • Epic
Dar'rak is a fighter and a wizard.
Action cards performed by Dar'rak are spells.
React: Once per turn, after Dar'rak casts a spell: Until end of turn, Dar'rak's melee strikes inflict an additional wound. If it was an Earth or Fire spell, Dar'rak also gains +4 ATK and AC until end of turn.

name: Darian Windson
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"I'm ready to pick up where I left off. For their sake, the Nothrog had best not have forgotten me, but I'll be sure to send them a reminder."

name: Darkspawn
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon / Bound
Darkspawn gains +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each other Daemon in this rank.
"They have started to breed and thus created monstrous new abominations." - Azam

name: Detonate
effect:
Earth
Spend Order: Target a character 1 or 2 ranks away, target each character in the first target's rank: Perform a +10 ranged strike against the first target. All targets must succeed with a reflex save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound.
"The secret is the right mixture, not the magic." - Loki

name: Dhamir il Maliq
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Efreet
Dhamir is both a fighter and a wizard.
Dhamir gains +1 ATK for each spell in your discard pile.
Dhamir's actions that produce melee strikes are Fire actions and ignore the Planar trait.
React: Once per turn, after target character targets Dhamir with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 18) or suffer a wound. This is a Fire action.
"You freed me, but I fulfil my own desires."

name: Dimensional Rift
effect:
This card is also a Level 3 cleric spell.
Order: Kill target summoned character.
Order: Target an opposing non-Warlord character that has no items equipped and is in the front rank of his formation: Return the target to his owner's hand.
"Some mistakes are easily undone." - Atiratu

name: Disintegrate
effect: Order: Target an unwounded character within 2 ranks: Succeed with a Skill check (DC = target's AC) to inflict a wound on the target or destroy an item equipped to the target.
"Let the Elements eat others and you shall be spared. It is a simple creed that I live by." - Austerion

name: Dominate
effect: Spend Order: Target a non-opposing character: If this cleric is a Cantor, the target gains +5 ATK until end of turn. The target performs an attack, spending as normal. Strikes from this attack inflict an additional wound.
"Every man hath a price, and there's not one that the Church of the Storm cannot pay." - Scelus

name: Dragon's Lair
effect:
Mercenary • Siege • Dragon
May not start in play.
May not perform actions other than the following:
React: Before a non-opposing Dragon enters play, kill Dragon's Lair: The entering rank of the Dragon is reduced by one, if possible.

name: Dress
effect:
Dwarf • Cantor
Your Dwarves in this rank gain +3 AC while they have one or more wounds.
"Such wounds are a mark of pride, so don't tie these bandages too tightly. I could do with a few new scars." - Vex Duntan

name: Dune Wolves
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monster
May not equip items.
While targeting a wounded character with a melee strike, Dune Wolves gains +2 ATK.
React: Once per turn, after Dune Wolves or a Lycanthrope you control wounds an opposing character with a melee strike: Move a Monster or Lycanthrope you control forward one rank.
"Those lost in the sands should pray that the wolves don't find them." - Darian Windson

name: Dust Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle • RIPOSTE +6
Dust Gargoyle is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 4.
React: Once per turn, after Dust Gargoyle is hit with a melee strike, spend a Dwarf cleric: Dust Gargoyle gains +1 HP until end of turn.
"Plentiful materials, endlessly replenishing." - Thekk

name: Earth Mephit
effect:
+2 Skill
Familiar
This cleric may not be moved with actions by opposing characters.
Order: Spend Earth Mephit: Gain +2 AC until end of turn. This is an Earth action.
"Even the smallest son of stone is an ally I would gladly fight beside." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Eternity Gate
effect: Spend Order; Spend and destroy (stun if this wizard is a Summoner) Eternity Gate: Return a character you control to his owner's hand.
"You should not use the gate without the supervision of one of my people, Nothrog." - Zul'Tan Bloodletter

name: Face Kit
effect:
While adjacent to two characters, this rogue gans +2 AC.
While in an opposing formation, rogues gain +1 Level for equipping Face Kit.
While in his own formation, this rogue may perform the STEALTH feat an additional time per turn.

name: Fancy Footwork
effect: React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike: Gain +4 AC until end of turn. You may redirect the strike to an adjacent character, if possible. You may shuffle Fancy Footwork into your deck.
"Sometimes I think Talin lets them get that close just so he can show off." - Keziah

name: Fesoof
effect:
Mercenary • Ranger / Bounty Hunter
React: After an opposing character becomes stunned: Move forward one rank.
"Fesoof can track anything. For the right price, he'll even kill it." - Azam

name: Fire Bats
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
Fire Bat's actions that produce melee strikes are Fire actions.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
"The fire bats are wonderful creatures. They tend to keep unbidden visitors away." - Yavlo

name: Fire Dance
effect:
Stance • 1 Charge
React: After this wizard performs a Fire spell: Put a Charge on Fire Dance.
React: Once per turn, after target character targets this wizard with a strike: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + twice the number of Charges on Fire Dance) or suffer a wound.

name: Fire Odem
effect:
Fire
Spend Order: Target a character 2 ranks away, target up to two characters in a rank behind the first target: Perform a +7 ranged strike against the first target. All targets must succeed with a magic save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound.

name: Fists of Kor
effect:
Gauntlet
React: Once per turn, before a melee strike roll: The strike ignores the Planar trait.
"We have lost much, Alaric. But those belonged to your brother and should smite Daemons just as well as they did Abyssals." - Mentor

name: Flamecaster
effect:
Bow
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. The target of the strike must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.
"Acquiring an efreet's essence is the hard part, but other than that, it works beautifully." - Scyrax

name: Forest of Bone
effect:
Elf • Undead • Siege
Forest of Bone gains +1 ATK and AC for each other Forest of Bone in play.
May not maneuver or equip items.
React: Once per turn, after target character moves into this rank: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer a wound.
"...The first the vermin will know of our arrival is when our domain rises around them, to choke thair carcasses into ivory perfection."

name: Forest People
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Up to four times per turn, after a character you control is killed: Forest People gain +1 Level until end of turn.
"These thickets are not yours, bone brows. Leave now, lest the masters punish your trespass."

name: Frostscale
effect:
Shield
Dwarves gain +1 Level for equipping Frostscale.
React: After this fighter is targeted with a spell, spend Frostscale: Gain +6 AC and Skill for the duration of the spell.
"Let Loki do his worst - he'll not breach this defense, lad." - Sigurdur

name: G'rath Firefist
effect:
Nothrog • Illusionist • Ogre Magi
G'rath may equip fighter Weapons.
Order: Once per turn, discard a spell: Until end of turn, Grath's melee strikes gain +2 ATK, inflict an additional wound, and are spells.
"They have what we lack-numbers."

name: Galam-Reth
effect:
The Chosen Warlord
Galam-Reth and your Daemons gain an ATK bonus equal to the Level of the highest Level Daemon in your discard pile.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Galam-Reth or target non-stunned Daemon you control performs a melee strike.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Move target Daemon forward one rank.

name: Garrotte
effect: While performing a melee strike against a spent character, this rogue gains +5 ATK.
"A small amoung of pressure will steal the truth from a man. A little more and it will steal his life." - Taisia

name: Ghed Kazouf
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Planar • Unique
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one (up to two if you won the initiative) rank(s).
React: Once per turn, after a Deverenian you control performs a Fire action: Kazouf performs a melee strike or a +6 ranged strike. This is a Fire action.
"The Stormborn now burn with fury."

name: Giant Scorpion
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
Opposing characters with the Poison trait within 1 rank suffer -2 AC.
Order: Twice per turn: Perform a melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target permanently gains the Poison trait and suffers -2 AC until end of turn.

name: Giant Toad
effect:
Steed
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
Order: Once per turn: Move backward one rank.
"I have never seen a steed as unlikely as this one." - Kerebrus

name: Glorgrim
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian • Hero • Epic • MAGIC RESISTANCE +5
React: After Glorgrim performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character, target a character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 14) or become spent or, if already spent, suffer a wound.

name: Gloves of the Fang
effect:
Gauntlet
This rogue's Poison actions gain +2 to DC saves.
Order: Reveal a Poison action card in your hand that this rogue can perform: Succeed with a SCRIBE check (DC 15) to attach the action as if it had been successfully scribed, otherwise discard it.

name: Gnarled Club
effect:
Shield
Order: Spend Gnarled Club, target a character within 1 rank (2 ranks if this cleric is a Druid): Until end of turn, while performing a melee strike against a stunned character, the target gains +4 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Those that falter shall be our prey." - Khilkhameth

name: Gnoll Archer
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Spend Order: Once per game: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"The brutes were foot soldiers in our armies long ago. It is time they returned to their old ways." - Zara

name: Griffon of Misear
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Griffon of Misear: Move forward one rank.
React: Before this fighter falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Griffin of Misear: This fighter does not spend or stun before moving.
"Thessyria has not seen their like before." - Keziah

name: Guilt-Ridden
effect:
While this card is in your discard pile, your Seers have the ability to perform it with an additional effect of removing it from the game.
React: Before target character kills a character you control: The target suffers a penalty to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to your character's Level until end of turn.

name: Gush
effect:
Nothrog
React: Before Gush dies: Perform a melee strike.
"Each good warrior knows that their own survival is irrelevant to victory. As long as they can eliminate their opposite numbers, they have done their commander proud." - Set'rokh

name: Hamadryagh
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid • Monster • Unique
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target any number of characters you control within 2 ranks: Each target must succeed with a Skill check (DC 17, 12 if the target is a Monster or Lycanthrope) to move forward or backward one rank.

name: Harem Guard
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
Your The Chosen Warlord and non-Daemon, non-Thrall The Chosen you control have the ability, "Order: Kill Harem Guard: Perform a melee strike."
"He has seen our true forms. Can we still trust him?" - Bixvrexe

name: Haseeka
effect:
Mercenary
React: Once per turn, after target stunned character moves forward without stunning: The target suffers a wound. This is an Earth action.
"The old gods still hold some sway here."

name: Healing Potion
effect:
A character may not equip more than one Healing Potion per game.
Order: Destroy Healing Potion: Remove a wound from a character in this rank.
React: Before target character in this rank suffers wounds, destroy Healing Potion: Reduce the wounds to zero.

name: Herick the Venomous
effect:
Deverenian
Your Warlord gains +2 to initiative rolls for each Charge on Herick.
React: After Herick kills a character: Put a Charge on Herick.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"Yavlo hath unleashed a questionable ally, Dmitir."

name: Hungry Spirits
effect:
Earth • Poison
This card is also a Level 5 rogue action.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds and may target within 1 rank. If the strike hits, spend the target, if possible. The target must succeed with three dexterity saves (DC 15) or suffer a wound for each failed save.

name: Hunter's Quarry
effect: Order: Target an opposing character within 3 ranks: Until end of turn, this fighter's melee strikes against the target gain +5 ATK. If this fighter is a Ranger, his ranged strikes against the target gain +5.
"They are strong. And it is surprising how stupid that makes them at times." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Iridescent Armor
effect:
+1 HP
Armor • Helm • MAGIC RESISTANCE +2
Fighters gain +1 Level for equipping Iridescent Armor for each wound on them.
"Yes, it is easy to forget about the hood. Once you wear it, it snakes out as if the piece had a mind of its own." - Sigurdur

name: Jigoral
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"The threats of daemons are nothing compared to the promises of the monsters in my head. Indeed, it's The Chosen that will learn to know terror from our Lady of Pain."

name: Jump
effect: Order: Move forward or backward one rank.
"You can't blame us! How were we supposed to know she was a wizard?" - Lorik

name: Keridwen
effect:
Mercenary / Tribe of Stags
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
"This land is strange, and life is bountiful. But the monsters are just as deadly and those called The Chosen corrupt everything. This I can not condone."

name: Keziah Firehair
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Bard • CHARISMA +6
Order: Once per turn: Target lower Level Free Kingdoms has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) the next time he attacks this turn.
React: Up to twice per turn, before a Free Kingdoms makes a die roll: Add 3 to the die roll's result.

name: Khilkhameth
effect:
Elf Warlord • Druid
Opposing stunned characters suffer -3 AC.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Put a Forest of Bone from your collection into play in an opposing front rank.
"Trees are but life grown from the dead; much stronger is the death that sprouts from the living..."

name: Leap of the Clouds
effect:
Order: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike: This rogue gains +4 AC for the duration of the strike.
"Impressive athletics, yes, but the magic boots help a lot." - Talin Tzin

name: Leonora
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn, Leonora has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when she attacks.
"My captain is eager to explore the possibility of coming ashore, but she wants certain assurances made first. What do you have to offer?"

name: Lightning Bolt
effect:
Air
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this wizard's Skill that inflicts an additional wound.
"A little storm magic, for the benefit of my new followers." - Dhamir il Maliq

name: Linnea Warsong
effect:
Dwarf / Order of Svanna
React: Before Linnea is killed: The next wounds suffered by a Dwarf you control are reduced by one.
"Each hymn the Winterhold choirs sing touches my heart. But I hear a dissonant note that reminds me of something..."

name: Log Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After target character targets this rogue or an adjacent character with a melee strike, spend Log Trap: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 15) or you may destroy an item equipped to the target.
"Try and catch me, daemon!" - Pinion

name: Lorik
effect:
Nothrog
Lorik's melee strikes may target an additional rank away.

The remainder of the legions stood in neat ranks as the first of the magi strode past to meet with the commander. Discipline was maintained, but there could be no mistaking the loathing in the warriors' eyes.

name: Loyal Nag
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Loyal Nag: Move forward or backward one rank.
"Sometimes it seems as if we two are the only ones that remember, old girl. But I swear, you will live long enough to see old gods returned to prominence." - Haseeka

name: Mad Mel Reyvilo
effect:
Mercenary Warlord / Pirate
Order: Put a Level 3 or lower character into play from your hand, ignoring loyalty penalties.
React: Twice per turn, after a melee strike roll against Mad Mel: If he succeeds with a dexterity check (DC 5 + the roll's result), the strike is a Critical Failure.
"Sure you are, lass. And I am the frog king."

name: Magma Elemental
effect:
Mercenary / Elemental
While you have a Fire spell in your discard pile, Magma Elemental gains +3 ATK.
While you have an Earth spell in your discard pile, Magma Elemental gains +3 AC.
While you have 5 or more Fire and/or Earth spells in your discard pile, Magma Elemental has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks and gains +1 HP.

name: Market Day
effect: React: After this rogue kills an opposing character: Retrieve target action card from your discard pile and put it into your hand. Remove Market Day from the game.
"You won't need this anymore. But me it will grant access to the palace." - Taisia

name: Markhan
effect:
Deverenian
While adjacent to a Stormwraith, Markhan gains +1 HP and DEFEND +10.
"Do not presume to assault the holy ones. Sand and Storm have both blessed them, and we are not worthy to stand in their presence."

name: Mask of Past Lives
effect:
Helm
May not be destroyed with card effects.
This rogue may detach and perform action cards that were attached to Mask with its Order. After such an action resolves, he must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.
Order: Once per turn: Attach a card from your hand face down to Mask.
"Long after its bearers have turned to dust, it remembers. Their nightmares, too." - Taisia

name: Master Anandale
effect:
Deverenian
React: Once per turn, after target ready non-Warlord character is targeted with a melee strike by Master Anandale: Spend the target.
"Discovery of a new world doth not excuse a lack of respect! An we forget the Empire's laws, we become no better than the savages here. 'Twould seem it falleth to me to restore decorum."

name: Master Kelkrys
effect:
The Chosen
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. This is a spell.
Order: Inflict a wound on Kelkrys or kill a Thrall: Until end of turn, Kelkrys' spells may target an additional rank away.

name: Maul of Justice
effect:
Weapon • Cursed
This cleric gains +3 ATK for each wound on characters you control.
While this cleric has a primary ATK of +15 or more, he gains POWERATTACK +10.
"Long have I pondered just how exquisite a punishment I shall bestow upon the traitors. Breaking their bones with this will do." - Dmitir

name: Measured Blow
effect:
This card is a Level 2 rogue action.
React: After this character targets target character with a melee strike: Either the strike gains +5 ATK or if it hits the target becomes spent or, if already spent, stunned. If the target is not already stunned, his controller chooses.

name: Mel'crah
effect:
Nothrog • Assassin • Unique • STEALTH +6
While in an opposing formation and targeting a spent character with a melee strike, Mel'crah gains +3 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike against a spent character that is a Critical Success or ready Mel'crah (opponent's choice).
"How easily a sharp sword parts your flesh. Do you feel it, too?"

name: Merciless Strike
effect:
This card is also a Level 4 cleric spell.
Spend Order: Target a stunned character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with four fortitude saves (DC 17) or suffer a wound for each failed save.
"We cannot afford mercy anymore." - Sir Robert of Andover

name: Mischief
effect: Order: Target ready character within 1 rank must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 17, 22 if this rogue is in an opposing formation) or become spent.
"If you are quick enough your enemies' numbers will indeed work against them." - Reynold

name: Mormaenion
effect:
Elf • Scout • Hero • Epic • MARKSMANSHIP +1
Order: Discard a card: Mormaenion may perform the MARKSMANSHIP feat an additional time this turn. Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"Her legend is one that requires a choir of fifty strangled throats to relate in its true nuance, and grows daily." - The Lady of Pain

name: Mud Slick
effect:
Earth
Druids may target any character regardless of Level.
Spend Order: Target a lower Level character: Move the target backward one rank.
"Those who do not agree with my methods may return to the filth from which they crawled." - Khilkhameth

name: Nabu's Necklace
effect:
Cantors gain +2 Levels for equipping Nabu's Necklace.
React: Before a die roll, spend Nabu's Necklace: Add 2 (3 if this cleric is a Seer) to the roll's result.
"Nabu? He is not a god, but just a myth." - Besh-kar

name: Nephela
effect:
Free Kingdoms / Pixie
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
React: Once per turn, after Nephela performs a melee strike that hit target character: Perform a melee strike against the target.
"Cute little things. Careful though, or they'll bite your finger through to the bone." - Keziah

name: Nothiel Elestra
effect:
Elf • Druid / Priest of Bone
Order: Once per turn, remove a card in any dicard pile from the game, target a non-Warlord Undead that has not received any permanent bonuses: The target permanently gains +2 ATK and AC.
Spend Order: Move an Undead you control forward one rank.
"A new dynasty begins here." - Morghen

name: Nu'man il Maliq
effect:
Deverenian • Bard • Efreet
Nu'man may perform Level 1 wizard spells.
React: Once per turn, before target higher Level Deverenian you control makes a die roll that was not preset: The target uses two dice for the roll. You may choose which one to use for the result.
"The efreet's tale is not one for mortal ears."

name: Obliterate
effect: Spend Order: If this fighter is in your front rank, target up to two non-Warlord characters within 2 ranks. Perform a melee strike against each target. If the strike hits, move the target forward one rank, if possible. Perform an attack without spending.
"One woman did all this?" - Master Anandale

name: Orlanon
effect:
Elf
React: After Orlanon enters play: Perform a +4 ranged strike against a character with the Poison trait.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"It is time for priests of all the Elements to work together as one." - Raclesis

name: Outmatched
effect: React: After target opposing character enters play in the front rank or moves into the front rank: If this fighter is in the front rank, perform a melee strike against the target.
"Twould seem the time hath come for us to remind the elves that we are their betters." - Master Anandale

name: Pelanth
effect:
Nothrog • MEDICINE +3 / Half-Troll
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on Pelanth: Your Nothrog gain +3 ATK until end of turn.
"Drink and grow strong."

name: Pierce Devon
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Order: Once per turn: If Pierce has no items equipped, move forward one rank.
"I will fight beside you, but I refuse to take the Yscar name."

name: Pinion's Vise
effect:
Dwarf • Siege • Unique
Gains the Trap trait while in play.
May not attack, equip items, or perform action cards.
Spend React: After target character targets a Dwarf within 1 rank with a strike: Perform a +6 ranged strike against the target. If the strike hits, the target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 17) or his strike is canceled.
"The calculations to actually make it work are beyond your simple mind." - Pinion

name: Power Word Pain
effect:
This card is also a Level 3 cleric spell.
Spend Order: Target a character within 3 ranks: Until end of turn, the target suffers a penalty to ATK and AC equal to this character's Level.
"For the frail mind, it does not matter whether it is real or not." - Raclesis

name: Puppet Mastery
effect:
Bards may perform this action regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order: Target a Cursed character: Destroy a Cursed item equipped to the target, or if the target is not wounded, inflict a wound on him.
Order: Target item within 3 ranks permanently gains the Cursed trait.

name: Purify
effect:
Earth
Order: Target a character: Unstun the target. The target permanently loses the Poison trait. You may remove a card attached to the target.
"Let them see your power, and they will fight for you willingly." - Mistress Dagani

name: Qar'Dak Stonerender
effect:
Nothrog • Ogre Magi
Qar'Dak may equip fighter items.
React: Once per turn, after Qar'Dak kills an opposing character with a spell: Move forward one rank or perform a melee strike.
"Even stone crumbles before our might. From you I am willing to simply accept unquestioning servitude."

name: Raging Hungerer
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Planar • Unique • POWERATTACK +6
At the end of each turn, kill a Thrall or Raging Hungerer permanently loses 1 HP.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward one rank.
"Never speaking, always killing." - Atiratu

name: Rellion Pikeman
effect:
Deverenian
If you won initiative this turn, Rellion Pikeman gains +2 ATK and AC.
"Letting thy guards blister in the burning sun doth woe for their heedfulness." - Taisia

name: Return to Us
effect:
Necromancers may perform this spell regardless of class restrictions.
Spend Order: You may discard a card, target one (two if you discarded a card) lower Level character(s) in your discard pile: Retrieve the target(s) and put them into your hand.
"Tell me-what did you see, in oblivion's depths?" - Raclesis

name: Rimefang
effect:
Dwarf • Dragon • Unique
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Characters in your front rank gain +3 to ATK, AC, and Skill.
Spend Order: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned and suffer -3 AC.

name: Rumbling Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
React: Once per turn, after a wound is reduced or removed from Rumbling Gargoyle: Rumbling Gargoyle permanently has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.
"When the rumbling stops, that's when its anger awakens." - Glorgrim

name: Ryan Mornington
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger / Pirate
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Ryan: The target cannot perform Reacts until end of turn.
"Get off my ship, filth!"

name: Sachiel
effect:
Elf / Priest of Blood
Undead in this rank gain +3 ATK while targeting a stunned character with a melee strike.
React: Once per turn, after target non-stunned character is hit with a melee strike by Sachiel: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 15) or become stunned.
"The gates are mine to guard."

name: Scale Mail
effect:
Armor
This fighter gains +2 AC while targeted with a ranged strike.
"I may lack the resilient hide of my daemon-kin, but steel can be just as discouraging to those thrice-damned assassins." - Galam-Reth

name: Scarlett
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout • MARKSMANSHIP +5
React: Once per turn, after an adjacent character performs a ranged strike: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"Why Keziah, I do believe you're jealous."

name: Scepter of Life
effect:
Shield • Unique
Order: Spend Scepter of Life: Target character gains +1 HP and MEDICINE +6 until end of turn.
"To the Chosen it is merely an instrument of power, but they do not mention the fact that it was crafted as a gift to the priestess of Inanna in ages past." - Brom Frostbeard

name: Scourge of Fangs
effect:
Weapon
This card is also a Level 4 cleric item.
Order: Once per turn, spend Scourge of Fangs, target an opposing character within one rank: Perform a melee strike against the target that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, the target permanently gains the Poison trait or, if he already has the Poison trait, suffers -5 AC until end of turn.
"Raclesis is a fool to believe he has found an escape from the Elements." - Khilkhameth

name: Scyrax' Spear Streamer
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
React: After target character is hit with a ranged strike by Scyrax' Spear Streamer: The strike inflicts no wounds. Move the target backward one rank.
"Fixed it!" - Snegrob

name: Seek Out Thine Enemy
effect: Order: Target an opposing character within 2 ranks: Until end of turn, this fighter has the ability, "React: After the target character moves or targets a character other than this fighter with a melee strike, perform a melee strike against him." If this fighter is a Paladin, he also gains RIPOSTE +10 until end of turn.

name: Seize the Moment
effect:
Tactics
React: Before your Warlord makes an initiative roll: He gains +10 to the roll.
"The thinnest rapier can fell a giant if only thou achievest the target with precision and at the exact right moment." - Brymin

name: Sentinel Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
May not equip items.
Dwarves adjacent to one or more Sentinel Gargoyles gain +2 AC.
"Untiring eyes. They do make me feel a little redundant." - Guardian

name: Shade Lion
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Shade Lion: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: Before this rogue falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Shade Lion: This rogue does not spend or stun before moving.
"Such marvelous beasts that these new arrivals have brought us." - Yvaalis

name: Shadith Glyn
effect:
Elf • MARKSMANSHIP +5
Order: Once per turn, spend a character in this rank: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

"Why should we follow a monster and a madman? At least the sea-elves provide us with the chance to kill humans; Khilkhameth preaches weaknesses like 'patience' and 'planning'. I don't see why Morghen trusts him."

name: Shadow Token
effect: STEALTH +5
"Some pay in gold, others pay in tokens of favor. To be honest with you, I'm not that fussy, so long as the trinkets can help me make more gold. So what's your starting offer, horseman?" - Mad Mel

name: Sharru
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
Your The Chosen Warlord and Daemons you control have the ability, "Order: Kill Sharru, target a lower Level character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 15) or become spent and move backward one rank."
"Sometimes an example must be made." - Naram-Sin

name: Shonta
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall • MEDICINE +2
Order: Once per turn: Target other non-Warlord Thrall gains +1 Level until end of turn.
"Galam-Reth has been dispatched to end the threat of the newcomers. The masters are finally taking an interest, and I weep at that."

name: Sir Pelimere
effect:
Deverenian • Free Kingdoms • Paladin • RIDING +4 • RIPOSTE +4 / Grey Rider
Sir Pelimere has the same alignment as your Warlord.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Until end of turn, any characters adjacent to Sir Pelimere gain +3 ATK and AC.

name: Sir'kan
effect:
Nothrog • Ogre Magi
React: Before a Nothrog targets a strike: Put Sir'kan into play from your hand. If Sir'kan entered play, the strike gains the Earth trait and cannot be canceled or redirected.
"Your baubles mean nothing to me. The lowest of us own riches you'd dream of."

name: Sky Splitter
effect:
Weapon
React: Twice per turn, after this fighter hits with a melee strike: Target character within 1 rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.
"This will cleave your skull as surely as lightning rends the horizon. Only with more gore, of course." - Zul'tan Bloodletter

name: Smoke Imp
effect:
+3 Skill
Familiar • Abyssal
Smoke Imp may cast wizard spells as if he were a Level 3 wizard with the Summoner trait, +0 ATK, 10 AC, +6 Skill, and 1 HP.
"Just listen to it. It makes a persuasive argument, does it not? Join us." - Ygrassyne

name: Soul Transfer
effect:
Spend React: Before this wizard is killed by an opposing character: Put a character into play from your hand.
Order: If this wizard is a Summoner, put a character into play from your hand. Move the character forward one rank, if possible.
"You do not want to know how it is done." - Atiratu

name: Soulless Scavenger
effect:
Elf • Undead
While Soulless Scavenger is in your discard pile, your Warlord, if he is an Elf, has the ability, "Order: Remove three characters in your discard pile from the game: Retrieve Soulless Scavenger from your discard pile and put him into play."

name: Spiritrender
effect:
Weapon • Cursed
This card is also a Level 8 fighter item.
This character's melee strikes ignore the Planar trait and are Critical Failures on a roll of 5 or less.
Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn, this character's melee strikes inflict an additional wound. This character must succeed with a poison save (DC 17) or suffer a wound.
"Some weapons should have never been forged." - Sigurdur

name: Spitting Cobra
effect:
+3 Skill
Familiar
Order: Spend Spitting Cobra, target a character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound. This is an Earth action.

name: Squire Fenric
effect:
Deverenian
Order: Once per turn, spend a character in this rank: Move forward one rank. If Fenric moves, he may perform a melee strike.
"Master Anandale hath joined us! He is a hero and a legend, an inspiration to us all! Victory shall be ours!"

name: Stormwolf
effect:
Steed • Unique
This card is also a Level 7 cleric item.
Order: Spend Stormwolf: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Stormwolf, target an adjacent character: Move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: Summon Stone
effect:
Earth
Spend Order: Until end of turn, this wizard has the ability, "Order: Twice per turn: Perform a +4 ranged strike."
"We do not build the weapons, the earth offers them to us." - Fancy

name: Symbiotic Bracers
effect:
Weapon • Gauntlet • Cursed
This wizard's melee strikes do not inflict wounds but, if they hit, spend the target instead.
React: After target character enters play: Equip Symbiotic Bracers to the target regardless of class, control and, if this wizard is a Summoner, Level restrictions. The target may not perform this action.

name: Tainted Wine
effect:
Poison
Order: Attach this card to target character within 2 ranks. While it is attached, the target gains the Poison trait.
Order: Target a character with the Poison trait within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 15) or suffer 2 wounds.

name: Tass'daesh
effect:
Nothrog • Illusionist • Ogre Magi
React: Once per turn, after Tass'daesh performs a melee strike that hit: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"This is my chance to be accepted by the Sapphire Circle."

name: Tegus Herders
effect:
Deverenian
Tegus Herders gains +1 ATK and AC for each Steed within 1 rank.
Spend Order: Target Deverenian gains RIDING +3 until end of turn.
"The Tegus tribe hath agreed to provide us with fresh steeds in exchange for the open plains, as I knew they would." - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Teshur's Thunderfist
effect: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. If this cleric is not in your front rank, the strike may target an additional rank away. If the strike hits, characters in your front rank gain +3 ATK and AC until end of turn.
"This cannot be, Tesur has left his people to perish long ago. There shan't be hope." - Besh-Kar

name: Teufeltiger's Mask
effect:
Helm
React: After target character targets this wizard with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a will save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer -5 ATK for the strike.
"I walk free, and the trickster is trapped in this mask. This is as it should be, and will forevermore be." - Dhamir il Maliq

name: The Dark Horse
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend The Dark Horse: Move forward one rank. If this fighter moved, he gains +3 ATK until end of turn.

"It hasn't got a name because it isn't a single horse. Many have served as my steed over the years, and few of them have survived more than a single skirmish. Some say that's a bad omen, but I say a worse omen would be for me to die and the horse to live." - Kerebrus

name: The Sable Knight
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • Hero • Epic • RIDING +7
Your Warlord gains +3 to initiative rolls.
React: Once per turn, after a character you control performs an order: You may perform a Decree.
"E'en I thought him a myth..." - Dmitir

name: Thrinnas Glyn
effect:
Elf • Scout
React: After a melee strike misses an Elf you control: move forward one rank.
"Calm yourself, Shadith. We lack the numbers to attack now, and must wait for Raclesis' plagues to do their work. Then, once the forests have grown, we can string the trees with human entrails."

name: Tome of Oblivion
effect:
Unique
Necromancers gain +2 Levels for equipping Tome.
Elf clerics may equip this item regardless of class restrictions.
Order: Once per turn, remove 5 cards from the top of your deck from the game: Retrieve a character from your discard pile and put it into play.

name: Tra'kelt
effect:
Nothrog • MAGIC RESISTANCE +10
React: After Tra'kelt succeeds with a MAGIC RESISTANCE check: Tra'kelt permanently gains +4 ATK and permanently has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks.
"Scarab is with us still."

name: Troglodyte Egg
effect:
Trap
React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll against a character within 1 rank, spend Troglodyte Egg: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 20) or the character gains +5 AC for the duration of the strike.
"He sold it as the egg of a Sutek queen." - Angus

name: Tumble
effect:
Dwarf
React: After a Dwarf in your front rank is killed and before fixing any illegal ranks: Put Tumble into play from your hand.
Spend React: After Tumble enters play, target a character within 1 rank: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 11) or suffer a wound. This is a Trap action.
"I brought a few friends with me."

name: Tzin's Blades
effect:
Weapon • Shield
This card is also a Level 4 fighter item.
If this character is a fighter, he gains POWERATTACK +5.
If this character is a rogue, he gains RIPOSTE +5.
If this character has both POWERATTACK and RIPOSTE, he gains DEFEND +5.

name: Unbalanced
effect: React: After target character performs a melee strike that missed this rogue: Perform a melee strike against the target.
"A bit hasty you are, are you not?" - Mormaenion

name: Unerring Shot
effect:
Scouts gain +1 Level for performing this action.
Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this rogue's Level.
"What do they expect? That your arm gets tired when you have that long to get your aim? Rediculous." - Shadith Glyn

name: Vachir
effect:
Deverenian
React: Before Vachir makes a strike roll, remove a Fire spell in your discard pile from the game. The strike gains +4 to the roll and is a Fire action.
"With the help of the outsiders, we finally have a chance to burn the usurpers from this world."

name: Venomward
effect:
Shield
This rogue gains +3 Skill against poison saves and +2 AC while targeted with a melee strike by a character with the Poison trait.
"And how is this supposed to help me?" - Keziah

name: Verdigris
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Unique / Mature Adult
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. Verdigris may perform a +7 ranged strike against any characters that were adjacent to the target of the first strike. Ready characters hit with these strikes become spent.

name: Wailing Scrambler
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Summoner
Wailing Scrambler's actions that produce strikes are Fire actions.
Order: Once per turn, you may spend Wailing Scrambler: Perform a +2 ranged strike. If you spent Wailing Scrambler, the strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Wall
effect:
Dwarf
Spend React: Before a strike roll against a Dwarf within 1 rank: The Dwarf gains +5 AC for the duration of the strike.
"It feels... reassuring to be behind fortifications again."

name: War Horse
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend War Horse: Move forward one rank.
Order: Spend War Horse: Gain +2 ATK until end of turn.
"Follow me and I shall bring you victory." - The Sable Knight

name: Warden
effect:
Dwarf
Spend React: After target character targets a Gargoyle you control with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 14) or become stunned.
"They're all like children to me, and I protect them as any parent would."

name: Whirling Blades
effect:
React: After this fighter pays the costs to perform an attack: Gain +3 ATK for the attack: If this fighter has a Weapon equipped, gain +5 ATK instead.
Order: Inflict a wound on target stunned character within 1 rank.

name: Wither and Bloom
effect: Spend Order: Target an opposing character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 20) or suffer a wound. If the target is killed by this action, you may put a Level 1 character (a lower Level character if this wizard is a Necromancer) from your discard pile into play.

name: Xeanara
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monster • Hero • Epic
May only equip Weapons.
React: Once per turn, after Xeanara moves into your front rank: Perform a melee strike.
"Centaurs are far from creatures of myth, although the greatest of their number fight with a strength forgotten by humanity." - Keziah

name: Ygrassyne
effect:
Deverenian • The Chosen • Cantor
While you have one or more Ygrassyne in play, your Stormwraiths gain MAGIC RESISTANCE +4 and your Thralls have the ability, "React: Before this character is killed as part of an action's payment: Perform a melee strike."
Order: Once per turn: Target non-Warlord character gains the Thrall or Stormwraith trait until end of turn.

name: Yil-Grayl
effect:
The Chosen • Cantor • Hero • Epic
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: All opposing characters within 1 rank suffer -4 ATK, AC, and Skill.
React: After Yil-Grayl enters play: Put each of the top two cards of your deck into play as Yil-Grayl's Dream Guard, a Level 3 classless character with the Thrall trait, +2 ATK, 12 AC, +0 Skill, 1 HP, and the ability, "This character may enter play in an illegal rank."
"I am the bringer of nightmares."

name: Zara
effect:
Mercenary • Assassin
Zara gains +2 Levels for performing Poison actions.
Spend Order: Discard a card: Retrieve a Poison card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.
"My cousin, too, was raised to fight the usurpers. In that we are alike." - Taisia

name: Zul'Tan Bloodletter
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Ogre Magi • POWERATTACK +0
May equip fighter Weapons.
Zul'Tan's ranged strikes from spells may target characters in an adjacent rank.
React: Once per turn, after target character is targeted by a spell by Zul'Tan: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.
